abstract: New York City officials announce that bike-share program Citi Bike will introduce service to Queens, expand service in Brooklyn and double in total size in two years.
lead_paragraph: Starting in August, the bike-share program plans to install the first stations in Long Island City, Queens, and add 79 stations in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Citi Bike to Begin Service in Queens and Expand in Brooklyn and Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Citi Bike to Start Service in Queens This Summer

snippet: Starting in August, the bike-share program plans to install the first stations in Long Island City, Queens, and add 79 stations in Brooklyn.
